title: disconnecting from game constantly
body:
My game disconnects from the game within a 10 minutes.
I have played steam games without connecting but once i am in game my adapter does not recognize any wifi networks and i cannot connect until i restart my computer a couple times. Then my computer finally picks up a connection. It began happening with the most recent windows update.

Please help i got demoted in a game i would have won and now i am a place lower than i should have been. :/ Please help me I enjoy this game and have tried a normal and it still happens

replies.body: I have the same issue, and it persists even with a wired connection. I know its not rito, because when I moved my computer to my dorms it works fine. But here at home, it disconnects for around 2 seconds every few minutes in games. I don't understand why and it ruins games that I should be winning.
same issue but literally everything else runs just fine, fix ya junk riot

It sounds like your network adapter may be having some driver issues or hardware failure. I'd recommend going to the manufacturer's support site and make sure you have the most recent driver installed. If you continue to see this happen, I'd recommend either swapping out the network adapter for another or try a wired (Ethernet) connection to your router/modem to see if this was unique to your wireless connection.

Let me know what you find out.
